page.title: 18Likes and dislikes
page.content: I enjoy waking up to singing birds.The best thing about the village is that it is quiet.It is good for biking and walking and lots of wildlife.I like to feel the country air.The area is nice and peaceful and you get lovely views, though in the summer there are too many nettles along the footpaths. l like the friendly people in my village.I like the way the people ask me if I want to play with them. There is not much playing area, I would like a playground with swings and slides. Although there are not many, I think the social activities in this area are fun for all ages. Most of the adults like working in their gardens in their spare time.
